external_references.source_name: Spenneberg, Ralf, Maik Brggemann, and Hendrik Schwartke March 2016
external_references.description: Spenneberg, Ralf, Maik Brggemann, and Hendrik Schwartke 2016, March 31 Plc-blaster: A worm living solely in the plc. Retrieved. 2017/09/19

objects.description: [PLC-Blaster](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1006)'s code is stored in OB9999. The original code on the target is untouched. The OB is automatically detected by the PLC and executed. (Citation: Spenneberg, Ralf, Maik Brggemann, and Hendrik Schwartke March 2016)
